programme.title: Undertrial
programme.desc: Sagar Hussain, a factory worker, is falsely accused of and imprisoned for raping his own daughters. Later, when his lawyer digs deeper, the truth reveals itself to be much worse than imagined.

programme.title: Mitti
programme.desc: Deva, a villager, goes on a violent rampage to avenge his sister's rape, and soon finds himself battling both the criminals responsible and the police.

programme.title: Hum To Mohabbat Karega
programme.desc: To pursue his love interest, TV reporter Geeta, Raju misleads the police with false clues during a murder investigation. His lies soon land him in trouble with the police and the mafia.

programme.title: Lucky-No Time For Love
programme.desc: A story of Lucky, a yound girl who is taken in by a wealthy family in Russia after being orphaned in war-torn Afghanistan . While adapting to her new surroundings, she meets a man who is initially distant and unapproachable, but eventually spend more time together and form a deep bond. Despite facing cultural differences and other obstacles, their love perseveres as they strive to be together.

programme.title: Zameer The Fire Within
programme.desc: A spoiled brat gets married to her professor despite several challenges. Soon after, he learns that his wife was responsible for the separation of his ex-girlfriend and he leaves her, never to return.

programme.title: Gulzar Dil (oru Naal Oru Kanavu Tamil) (dub)
programme.desc: It's is a romantic drama about Cheenu, a young man who initially pretends to fall in love with Maya as part of a challenge. However, he eventually falls for her for real, and they must overcome family obstacles to be together.

programme.title: Nirbhay
programme.desc: After a mother abandons her child and leaves him in an orphanage, he is falsely accused of two murders and faces jail term. After he walks out of prison, he seeks revenge from the culprits.

programme.title: Beti
programme.desc: Sudha assumes a recent acquaintance is the man she's being asked to marry and agrees to the match. When she realises her mistake it's too late, and she has to choose between love and family honour.

programme.title: Dil Aur Mohabbat
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a policeman raises his son all by himself and expects the latter to be a good person. However, the policeman is left disappointed after the son grows up.

programme.title: Nirbhay
programme.desc: After a mother abandons her child and leaves him in an orphanage, he is falsely accused of two murders and faces jail term. After he walks out of prison, he seeks revenge from the culprits.

programme.title: Vidrohi
programme.desc: Vidrohi is an action drama. The movie follows the story of an honest officer, Inspector Devendra Pratap Singh, whose only priority is to protect the law. He takes great risks to catch the dreaded dacoits Naag Singh and Bhoop Singh, however, the duo decide to surrender themselves to Police on the advice of a cunning man, who has a plan to protect them, and also make it hard for Devendra. Later, Devendra is arrested on the charges of murder of Bhoop Singh, however, he escapes the prison, when he learns about Bhoop Singh and Naag Singh’s plan. He then embarks the journey to catch the culprits and prove his innocence. Will he succeed in his mission

programme.title: Hasina Maan Jayegi
programme.desc: Rakesh and Kamal, doppelgangers of one another, fall for the same woman, Archana. However, when their petty rivalry evolves into something more sinister, she must find her true love.

programme.title: Mera Pati Sirf Mera Hai
programme.desc: Roopa does not get along with Prakash, her husband, and suspects he is having an affair. Things take a turn when she starts spreading vile rumours about Sharda, a woman living next door.

programme.title: Santosh
programme.desc: A wealthy woman falls in love with a poor man, whom she marries and has a child with, but soon she longs for her old life and abandons both her husband and son. She remarries a rich man, with whom she has another son. Years later, the two boys find themselves on opposite sides of a struggle.

programme.title: Naya Daur

programme.title: Harshit
programme.desc: This film is inspired by Shakespeare's Hamlet, written by Dhruva Harsh. It contains all the Shakespearean elements like, betrayal, love, hatred, revenge, sexual jealousy, poetic justice and dilemma of existence. Harshit is a protagonist synonymous to Hamlet, a Hindu boy living in a Muslim dominated area in Mumbai, India, loves Rahila, his neighbour. Later on fate plays a game in which two innocents, Harshit n Rahila are trapped.

programme.title: Love Ishtory
programme.desc: Chhavi belongs to a Brahmin family. She loves Aakash who is from a backward caste. Chhavi’s father is very disappointed with her daughter’s decision. Her father orders local inspector Dubey to catch Aakash to rough him up. But Chhavi’s elder brother Vicky appears in between. Vicky’s intention seems as he will blow Aakash’s head off. But there is a twist in the tale.

programme.title: Ludo
programme.desc: Two girls accidentally find out that in addition to the man they unknowingly share, they also share a lot of gifts from him. Including a game of Ludo which resembles their lives in some manner.

programme.title: Pilibhit
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories, Siraj, a righteous, impoverished flute maker, resides at the edge of the forests of Pilibhit, North India, where man-eating tigers thrive. His mounting livelihood pressures and tragedies corner him to take a drastic measure that threatens to tear down his values and a loved one.

programme.title: Arundeep Singh
programme.desc: A man with a speech disorder who even struggles to do his day to day activities will face his greatest fear of dating a woman.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: Dawn to Dusk tells the narrative of Nisha Rawat, a young girl who lost her parents. She has skin cancer, Malignant Melanoma and her entire life revolves around the night. Nisha accepted her circumstances as they were. Her life, however, is turned upside down when she meets Suraj, a boy who works at a hospital. Dawn to Dusk becomes Nisha and Suraj's narrative.

programme.title: Doughnut
programme.desc: Sameer, on his afternoon break from work, walks into a restaurant hoping for some quiet time. However, a doughnut with supposedly magical properties has him in for a shock. Fearing the unreal powers he suddenly acquires, he hurries out. How does a young woman who walks in right then change Sameer's attitude towards the magical doughnut?

programme.title: 10.30 Lets Go To School
programme.desc: Disha is an ordinary village girl with dreams like any other kid. Not only does she love her father unconditionally, but also her books and school. Life takes an unexpected turn when her Baba and Bua decide to discontinue their education. Her fate is about to meet that of thousands of other children who drop out of school every year. However, it is not so easy to give up. She is intelligent, confident and above all, determined to get back what she rightfully deserves, her right to dream!

programme.title: Kamera
programme.desc: He is a 12 years old boy, who works in a garbage dump and lives in the slum along with his mother. Both have different ideologies towards life. He is a staunch believer of being positive and has a dream of spreading smiles. But, his mother is a frustrated woman. While working, he finds a digital camera in the dump. His friend tells him that people smile whenever you point it towards them. He soon realizes the same and gets all thrilled to spread smiles including his mother. Unfortunately, the camera gets lost and all his dreams get shattered. What happens next is the core of the film. The story revolves around the perception of a small kid who wants to follow his dreams.

programme.title: The Apple
programme.desc: Story of two kids and how their life coincides whilst exchanging an Apple. The story reflects the societal dichotomy under the same sky in a small town near Delhi. The film is Accredited in the British Council Global Film directory and quoted by BBC as an "absolutely brilliant thought-provoking film.

programme.title: Dum Dum Deega Deega
programme.desc: The solution to your problem is often hidden in the problem itself; all you need is a different outlook. The story of a beggar child, Ajju, who lives on the streets of Mumbai, but dreams big. He challenges his unfortunate fate, with nothing but a 'different outlook' towards the situation he faces.

programme.title: Kissss
programme.desc: Joy and Ichcha elope from their respective houses as their parents are against them getting married. They take shelter at Joy's friend, Mihir's place. Mihir, who meets Ichcha for the first time is enchanted with her beauty. He is wondering why the families are against such a wonderful pair. Watch to find out the secret behind.

programme.title: Make Her Happy
programme.desc: Nandita and Rahul are to be married soon. They are a live-in couple. Things take a U-turn when Rahul gets a call from his ex-girlfriend 'Suhana'. Will Rahul be able to save himself? Watch to find out who has trapped whom.

programme.title: Be Khush
programme.desc: Be Khush' is a satire and commentary on commercialism and the society we live in. In a dystopian world, where happiness is scarce and nobody is happy, comes 'Be Khush'. A pill which can provide you happiness on any occasion. But what happens, when someone starts giving away happiness for free?

programme.title: Cheater
programme.desc: Love is blind, they say. And, sometimes, quite literally! How many of us are guilty of forgiving our partners once too often for their hurtful actions? When it comes to a cheating spouse, however, you would think there was no scope for forgiveness.

programme.title: Aakhri Kahani
programme.desc: A struggling writer decides that he's going to make one last effort to pitch his idea to a film producer. He gets the chance to do so in an unusual way when he turns out to be driving a cab that the producer has hired.

programme.title: Abba Ki Chaddi
programme.desc: in Small town where she lives.. Whose husband used to bother her a lot and was responsible for everything, One day suddenly her husband starts fearing her in the name of his father's stick.she does not like his words,makes

programme.title: ABC
programme.desc: For some people life is about triumph against all odds, for some; life is only about complexities. Some walk through this road aimlessly and some; actually become the bridge. ABC is a short film that showcases the dichotomy between two extreme yet simple individuals. It is an empowering film which has the dexterity & optimism to resonate amongst all sections of audience. As humans, we do tend to forget that we are but one world than just mere economy, that it can just take one human, just one moment, just one action to turn around the paths of millions. ABC; is just a sweet gentle reminder of this thought.

programme.title: Baalak
programme.desc: A film about a girl moving to Kolkata for her new job. She chooses a hotel for overnight stay where an incident makes her realize that life revolves in a circle and carries her emotionally very close to her home and family.

programme.title: Gutargu
programme.desc: Gutargu is a romantic Hindi short story about a guy a girl who admire each other, and are falling for each other secretly. Their unusual love story takes place on a rooftop. Will their love story have a happy ending?

programme.title: Hack-her
programme.desc: Shraddha, about to leave for America through a Corporate that is currently under attack by a hacker, who is on run by the police and is currently on every news channel. Between all this is Vishesh, who truly loves Shraddha, and now even she is going, just like his parents, leaving him all alone. But not everything we see is true, a hacker on a mission, a girl with ambitions, and a lover, sounds good right? But who is who? Do we know the entire truth? Find out everything in our upcoming short film "Hack-Her"

programme.title: In Your Arms
programme.desc: Payal and Nikhil have been married for 14 years, have lived happily and celebrated all the important occasions together. But now, sitting at the breakfast table, Nikhil breaks his silence, tells Payal that he does not want to drag this relation any further since there is no love left in their relationship. He confesses that he is in love with his colleague and they should get a divorce. Payal tells him that she will give him divorce but she has conditions which need to be fulfilled. Will Nikhil agree to it? What is the condition? Watch this awesome romantic short film to find out.

programme.title: Love, Bites
programme.desc: Love, bites is a romantic drama where the story revolves around the lives of Karthik, an artist, and Meghna, scientist. Their sexual chemistry is obvious to everyone. Even to those who haven’t seen them together, since they like to flaunt the hickeys on their body. But something changes in their equation when the hickey becomes a bridge of memory that leads to an old sexual encounter Meghna had which Karthik finds out about. Will Meghna be able to help Karthik erase the marks of her past? Or will Karthik just to have to wake up to a realization that the past, even though it haunts, might not be real.

programme.title: Panch Din
programme.desc: A Married couple meets in a cafe to take divorce but coincidentally their common friend meets them and reminds them of something which might make a shift to their minds.

programme.title: Thanks Mom
programme.desc: Thanks Mom is a human & a universal story of every mother & son that will melt your hearts away. The film's strength is its emotional value and connectivity to the viewers. It is the most honest & truest form of interpretation of a mother's role. It highlights a mom-son connection that is frayed and rough around the edges, filled with awkward silences and unsaid feelings that both find difficult to navigate but come around for each other when the time comes.

programme.title: Abnormal
programme.desc: This is the tale of a mother who grapples with societal challenges due to her transgender son. She confronts opposition from her family and the broader community, yet resolves to safeguard her child's future. Eventually, she triumphs in establishing their identity within society.

programme.title: Believer
programme.desc: The story revolves around a young man who is struggling with his career and has to face tough situations on the financial front. In a state of dejection/ despair he has a dialogue with his inner self. His negative self talks him into addictions and resorting to drugs or committin suicide (escapist attitude) He usually feels at home in the company of his negative self and seeks solace here. Yet somewhere he is dissatisfied and constantly looking for his positive self, whom he has only abandoned

programme.title: Arjun
programme.desc: Arjun is a soldier who works more like a mercenary in a never-ending war. He willfully follows the brutal orders of his commanding officer until one day, his entire world turns upside down. Examining one soldier's journey toward redemption, we show that our shared humanity is always worth fighting for underneath the trappings of all that divides us.

programme.title: Bumbhaiyya
programme.desc: The movie shows that how a common man is affected by the inter-religious conflicts that happen and how in the end he understands the real truth.

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Freedom is based on the lives of three women. All of them are going through the difficult challenges, which is made by society and their own family members. Despite living in democratic society lots of women still do not have permission to follow their passion or choose their carrier.

programme.title: Just Take It Easy
programme.desc: The story is basically on internal happiness. Sanjay a businessman is the CEO of Oberoi Industries. He is not happy in his life. Despite having all the materialistic pleasure not happy internally. The company celebrates its success party on its high growth. Sanjay invites a model Priyanka, his girlfriend to the party. He promises her to make the face of Oberoi Industries.

programme.title: Mingi
programme.desc: In Malaysia, Mingi and Elisa, a couple, face a challenging twist in their lives. Mingi, born blind and grappling with amnesia, travels to India for a brief visit. Tragically, during his absence, Elisa dies. The narrative introduces a doctor who believes the killer is a figment of Mingi's imagination, adding a psychological dimension to the story

programme.title: Foul
programme.desc: Against the setting of a journey to Thailand, Ayush, a lustful businessman, possesses both the capability and cleverness to be unfaithful to his wife and shatter her aspirations of moving to Canada. Yet, the question remains: Can he thwart her pursuit of realizing her dreams?

programme.title: Lock-Up
programme.desc: Inspector Maya Verma Has Just Arrested A Young Girl From The Red Light District. Kanchan Is Defiant And Unaffected, At First. A Conversation Between Them Leads To An Interesting Revelation. A Twisted Night With A Twisted End.

programme.title: Dubki
programme.desc: Dubki is a story based on a true incident of a female constable in male-dominated law enforcement. Despite being a tough and dominant constable at the Lalkurti police station, Ganga Yadav was troubled several times by SHO Durgesh Mishra. Ganga complained about it to the IPS officer and asked for a transfer; however, he refused to help her. The female constable was left with no other choice but to take justice into her own hands.

programme.title: Dwand
programme.desc: Ruby, a lower-middle-class girl was made to believe that she is beautiful, intelligent, and different and that she deserves a worthy husband. She completed her studies and wanted to be a career girl. However, the marriage happened contrary to her expectations with a traditional man Vivek of the similar lower middle-class strata. After giving birth to a girl child she revolted and joined an advertising company to shape up her career. Here begins the nightmare.

programme.title: Late Night Taxi
programme.desc: All the fears of a girl come to life after she travels in a late-night taxi she had booked. Does she reach home safely?

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Office
programme.desc: A young woman is feeling uncomfortable around older male colleagues who are treating her unfairly. She seeks help from HR but does not receive the support she needs. She wonders why she is always the one being blamed and considers ways to address the situation and overcome it

programme.title: Threes A Couple
programme.desc: 3 Lives Change after they cross each other's path on one auspicious night.

programme.title: Prowl
programme.desc: A young girl pays a visit to a mysterious stranger after connecting with him through a dating site. What follows is either a cautionary tale or a parable, based on how you view it.

programme.title: Aakhri Sawari
programme.desc: Manish, a perfect husband and father, tormented by a mysterious parcel he receives from an anonymous sender has to make a life-changing decision. He shares his problems with his cab driver who listens patiently and tries to help. What the cab driver offers changes both of their lives forever.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: The film is about Sara’s journey as she goes about understanding her role in the greater scheme of things. Sara - who has lost her twin sister to a mysterious vanishing - is trying to come to grips with her loss.

programme.title: Bully
programme.desc: In This Psychological Thriller, A girl who is holding her brother hostage must confront the darker aspects of her life and come face to face with the truth.

programme.title: Beyond Failing
programme.desc: This film captures intricate nuances of student stress, competition the so called rat race, parent child relation and purposeless living vs. purposeful living.

programme.title: Bhagwaan - The Faith
programme.desc: A final chance meeting with a mysterious old homeless man changes everything they’ve experienced that day. The story delves into how deep their faith truly is and how people worship gods. Some use faith and god as a means of solace while others as a crutch for a troubling life.

programme.title: Bharam
programme.desc: A Hindi drama short film about an executive visiting a house to give away a Mercedes won by a housewife in a lucky draw and the confusion that follows.

programme.title: Bindu
programme.desc: Bindu, a little school-going girl, and his older brother Gaurav live in the hilly regions where they barely make their day’s end meet. Gaurav works in the early shifts as a paperman, delivering news on his cycle, and finds time in between for Bindu to take her to school. A stitched-up overused shoe, an old ragged school bag, Bindu becomes the epitome of being a struggling unprivileged kid while Gaurav holds on to his pair of old sandals, the same pair of dress, and an old cycle.

programme.title: Blurred Lines
programme.desc: 24-year-old Apoorva is caught in a tangle of relationships when she has an epiphany that she is attracted to her best friend who has come to dress her up to meet prospective in laws.

programme.title: Bridge
programme.desc: Mukesh is a widower and has a 28-year-old so Rahul. They live together and rarely talk amicably with each other. Rahul thinks his father is too weird for his age whereas Mukesh thinks why Rahul constantly judges him for his choices.

programme.title: Calling Bell
programme.desc: A psychopath Biriyani Delivery boy barges into the house of a young lady and threatens to kill her. The story revolves around this confrontation between these two characters. The climax of the story turns out to be something very unexpected.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: We all have a fantastic life but we spoil it with our silly ideas of how to live it. This story is about how in trying to define a relationship, we actually end up confining it. One such definition is marriage and this is what is discussed in Cheers by two intimately close friends - one of whom is helping the other decide against a bad marriage that she has chosen to live with for some time now, thus stifling herself from all the happiness she is entitled to. While the intent of the friend seem questionable, the story is about why she trusts him more than anyone else with this issue that she is facing

programme.title: Tohfa
programme.desc: A gentleman bestowed upon his cherished wife an incredibly valuable and heartwarming present, yet fate had a different plan in store for their journey.

programme.title: Chashmishq
programme.desc: A tale of two budding lovers, their glasses, and the unforeseen challenges that come between their first kiss.

programme.title: Live A Little Part 2
programme.desc: After 5 years, Nimisha and Atish meet again at a party. She is awarded Best Emerging Entrepreneur by none other than Atish. Atish couldn't let another day go by without confronting Nimisha. Both seem happy and has moved on in their lives until they realize they've been living in a delusion. They reminded each other of their Pact which was made 5 years ago. Live a Little . Then made sudden plans which led to unexpected confessions which led to the most memorable night of their lives.

programme.title: Alvida
programme.desc: Break-ups can be hard, but sometimes they are necessary. Sometimes, you need all your strength to let go and say ... Alvida.

programme.title: Something Like Love
programme.desc: Something like love is the story of Karan and Simran, who have perceived love differently all their lives. Karan's love language is poetry, and for Simran, if love isn't DDLJ, it isn't love.

programme.title: Pravaah The Flow
programme.desc: This story is about this Nature photographer Shivoham. Through his travel, he likes to explore and capture wonderful, breath taking creations of nature and places. But how can a journey be complete, without interesting escapades? 5 different locations, 5 different interactions revealing the darkest secrets, depth of life, deep hidden emotions and finally, ending the journey with an experience that leaves him all rejuvenated…as if he had a new birth and gets him all set for the next one.

programme.title: Ramdeen (now & Then)
programme.desc: This is a story based on the deep-rooted stance of feudalism in two chosen timelines; 1965 and present-day respectively. The protagonist Ramesh, is a skinny, middle-aged man who works as an office boy at a production house, despite having a mundane and monotonous lifestyle he is very kind, well-spoken, and calm by nature. The stories of Ramdin and Ramesh unravel back and forth and give us a compelling idea about how instilled the concept of feudalism is, in societies new and old.

programme.title: Saanjh
programme.desc: SAANJH tells the story of Shyam and Sandhya, childhood friends who meet for the last time. Shyam loves Sandhya, but she sees him only as a friend. We surprisingly learn that Shyam is actually struggling with mental disorder, and Sandhya is nothing but just in his imagination. Despite the calm riverbank setting, Shyam's inner struggles are evident. As Shyam faces reality, he realizes he must accept things as they are, showing the power of love and understanding ourselves.

programme.title: Samaapan
programme.desc: This is the story of a Pandit, Tribhu Pandey. One day while returning from a funeral feast comes across a mysterious skull in the forest with many secrets.

programme.title: Yaantrik
programme.desc: Siddharth is a novelist. He is known for his different types of writing patterns. He always talks to his soul for some creative suggestions. Now he wants to write about a character called "Yaantrik". Siddharth wants to write a book on Yaantrik but this time as an experiment he wants to become a Yaantrik and then write a book. He will follow the routine of Yaantrik. His inner soul is not convinced with this idea. After being blocked in his own idea how his inner soul helped him out is the film.

programme.title: Life 2.0
programme.desc: Life 2.0 is the reflection of modern life, where Humans have become like God. GOD means generator, operator & destroyer but look at us, what are we doing; we are also doing the same.

programme.title: Khalish
programme.desc: Everyday violence in the household plagues the childhood of a girl. The helplessness and anxiety that arises from such an experience builds in her as she grows up. Her aversion to authority manifests itself in extreme outcomes later.

programme.title: Laugh
programme.desc: A film about who we were and who we've become , how socialising was and where its reached ,how something as simple as laughing has taken a complicated turn

programme.title: Duty
programme.desc: Different classes in society are intertwined, with each person's actions impacting others. When individuals from various classes fulfil their responsibilities, stability is achieved. This story explores fairness and the expression of duty among people from different social strata.

programme.title: The Decision
programme.desc: The Struggle of a Female Actress in the Film Industry: A young woman faces difficulties when working with a demanding director who creates a stressful environment. She expresses her concerns to the producer, but he reacts angrily and uses harsh language toward her. Will the actress decide to find a way to work together or stand up for herself?

programme.title: Game Of Caste
programme.desc: Game of Caste centers on Rakesh, an ordinary man visiting his aunt in her native village. He's initially captivated by the village's beauty but soon confronts a harsh reality: the mistreatment of a lower-caste boy by the villagers. This revelation shocks him, leading to his determined fight for the boy's rights. The overarching question remains: can he succeed in this battle between humanity and caste discrimination?

programme.title: Bena
programme.desc: After a set of jewelry goes missing, the police search Bena's bag. Her employers, Bhai and Bhabhi, are shocked to see the contents. They throw her out and Bena spends the day calling people for jobs. The family driver calls Bena and informs her that the set was found. Bena knew that the set would be found as it was misplaced not stolen. Next, she gets a call for a new job. Bena finds out that her employer Bhabhi had recommended Bena. Why was Bena thrown out of her job? What in the bag?

programme.title: Beshak
programme.desc: Story of a couple where the wife couldn’t find the difference between dream and reality and doubt enters into the relationship!

programme.title: Choices
programme.desc: Ritesh and Yami are just a day away from their marriage, and ritesh makes a confession which may affect their upcoming relationship, or maybe not?

programme.title: Cratch
programme.desc: When two individuals coming from two different parts of society with completely distinctive thought processes COLLIDE there would be Chaos, Confusion & a lot of disagreement, but would there ever be an eye-opening conversation? Watch this short to find out Kamrul's unique take on Life and how it affects Manay's perception towards it.

programme.title: Days Left Behind
programme.desc: A man struggles to survive in a post-apocalyptic India where the World has been devastated by a deadly virus that turns people into wild cannibalistic creatures, until one day he comes across an abandoned car.

programme.title: Desh Ki Pardesh ?
programme.desc: The film follows the Parikh's on their visit to their children settled in the US. However, to only realize that there's a lot more than just a generation gap between them. Mainly, dawning upon Hasmuk Parikh's that it's great to dream big for your children, but one must be mentally prepared that those dreams may or not have them in it.

programme.title: Destiny's Two
programme.desc: Mohan and his dwarf wife have come to Mumbai from Gujarat for his work. They are a newly wed couple. Their marriage is a compromise, as they do not see the spouse of their imagination in each other. Mohan who gets fascinated seeing taller women realizes the same about his wife. He decides to go to a red light area to fulfill his desire. But does he do it?

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Even in this modern era, there are several religious conflicts around us. We start judging a stranger based on his/her religion or culture. This short film is a humble attempt trying to reduce the distance between religions and thereby portraying religious bondage.

programme.title: Charitra Varnan
programme.desc: A cab driver comes across a woman standing and crying along the roadside. He tries to help her and tells her that he would drop her home safely. What happens next will leave you stunned.

programme.title: First Sin
programme.desc: What would you do if you unexpectedly obtain magical powers? Ashwath, a failed businessman is having a troubled relationship with his wife . One fine morning he gets a Sand-timer at his door steps. Life takes a turn when he discovers magical powers in it. Will the Sand-timer be a boon or curse ?

programme.title: Harmless
programme.desc: A boy down on his luck. A girl looking for thrills. A plot is hatched. A kidnapping is staged. As far as crimes go, this one seems harmless. But, as with all things, there is a price to pay. A hefty price. Harmless begins as a crime-thriller and develops into a dramatic adventure with a little bit of romance thrown in.

programme.title: Trishul
programme.desc: Vijay Kumar, illegitimate son of construction baron Raj Kumar Gupta, seeks revenge after his mother's death. He aims to destroy the Gupta family's business and connections.

programme.title: Farishtay
programme.desc: Young Gayatri is devastated when husband Arjun is brutally killed. She's horrified to learn her brothers, Veeru and Dheeru, who helped her marry Arjun, work for his killer.

programme.title: Waqt Ki Awaz
programme.desc: Lata runs from arranged marriage, falls for truck driver Vishwa. She's devastated when he's arrested for murder.

programme.title: Mera Muqaddar
programme.desc: Suraj leaves Shanti and their newborn. He marries Ruchi, who also has a son. The two boys grow up fighting, unaware they are half-brothers.

programme.title: Lakshmanrekha
programme.desc: Sentenced to death, criminal Mangal escapes, assumes new identity as a school teacher in a small village. His past catches up, and he must face its aftermath.

programme.title: Chot Aj Isko, Kal Tereko
programme.desc: Elderly noble Ambaprasad, realizing relatives only care for his wealth, discards it and leaves home in search of happiness.

programme.title: Mera Karam Mera Dharam
programme.desc: Abandoned as a young child, lonely Vicky finds affection in a teacher and Aarti. When Aarti's uncle sells her, she kills herself to escape assault. Enraged, Vicky becomes an underworld don, seeking revenge on her molesters.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila fall in love in New Zealand. In India, Raju helps pregnant Sharmila, posing as her husband, only to realize she's Urmila's sister.

programme.title: Beta
programme.desc: A family's sanctity is tested when the husband brings home his illegitimate nine-year-old son. His devastated wife struggles to accept, but the child softens her heart.

programme.title: Kaun Sachcha Kaun Jhootha
programme.desc: Ajay lives happily with family & girlfriend, gets a high-end job. Framed for assaulting three college girls, he goes to prison, destroying his personal life.
